page.title: 15LIVING IN THE SKY
page.content: LIVING IN THE SKY IN EAST KILBRIDE Would you like to live in a tower block? We will describe to you what it is like. There are good security systems in the blocks. You have to type the flat number into a telecom system. If the resident answers he can open the door by pressing a button in his flat. Most of the blocks in East Kilbride have good rubbish disposal systems. A person can put rubbish down a chute and it will reach a store_room to await collection. The blocks also have good drying facilities. Washing lines are situated on the roof to make full use of the wind. Although residents do not have their own gardens, there are plenty of open spaces and play areas nearby. How does it sound to you?
